content.raw: So currently, reset model poses will reset velocities to zero, but will not reset all link poses (so it will not disturb running controllers, yet it will not recover from exploded simulation).  We should add yet another "reset all but time" function, for recovering from NaN's and keep time running so user do not have to restart controllers, which is hard to do sometimes without restarting the entire simulation (consider reloading plugins).
